last_episode_to_air.name: Chess Story (2)
last_episode_to_air.overview: With the city in crisis, Anneli faces an ultimatum, and Kari must decide just how far he's willing to go to stop his nemesis.

name: Bordertown
overview: The story of DI Kari Sorjonen of the Serious Crime Unit in Lappeenranta, his family, and his investigations into a variety of harrowing homicides around the border area.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Detective Inspector Kari Sorjonen is one of the most respected officers at the National Bureau of Investigation in Finland. When his wife barely survives brain cancer, Sorjonen decides to take his family to an idyllic small town near the border of Russia, to live a quiet peaceful life.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: In season 2, no one will be able to escape their past. The five crimes of the season are called Five Finger Exercise, The Rite of Spring, Cat’s Cradle, Bloodmaid and Without a Shadow. Each of these murder cases takes the viewer on a journey into humanity’s dark secrets in the midst of a small town’s summer idyll on the shores of Lake Saimaa.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: While juggling concerns about his family's future and a spate of new crimes, Kari squares off against an adversary who's been studying his past cases.

episodes.name: The Dolls' House (1)
episodes.overview: Seeking a simpler life, detective Kari Sorjonen and his family move to a quiet lakeside town, where he's immediately called in to solve a murder.

episodes.name: The Dolls' House (2)
episodes.overview: While Sorjonen and team inspiect the new crime scene, Katia's mother searches for clues at the resort. A reporter begins digging into Sorjonen's past.

episodes.name: The Dolls' House (3)
episodes.overview: Lena tracks down a crucial clue to the kidnapper's identity. Johanna's secrets catch up with her. Degerman reaches out to Paulina.

episodes.name: Dragonflies (1)
episodes.overview: As Sorjonen investigates the suspicious death of a drug squad officer, Janina is drawn into a circle of teens planning an epic, drug-fueled party.

episodes.name: Dragonflies (2)
episodes.overview: A second death linked to the pills prompts Sorjonen to travel to St. Petersburg with a new team member. At the party, an uncomfortable scene unfolds.

episodes.name: The Fury (1)
episodes.overview: The team investigates a Europol tip on a dogfighting ring, and Hannu-Pekka asks Kari for help after his date with an escort takes an alarming turn.

episodes.name: The Fury (2)
episodes.overview: Lena goes undercover at a fight club, straining her relation ship with Katia. A colleague slips Sorjonen troubling information about their target.

episodes.name: The Lady in the Lake (1)
episodes.overview: A woman found alive in a fish trap at the bottom of the lake presents an unsettling new challenge for the team. A politician asks Taina for a favor.

episodes.name: The Lady in the Lake (2)
episodes.overview: Called to the scene of a deadly crash, Sorjonen tries to connect the dots between Elina and the stolen car. Pauliina moves ahead with her secret plan.

episodes.name: The End Game (1)
episodes.overview: Sorjonen's worlds collide when Janina wakes up spattered in blood and finds herself at the center of a murder investigation.

episodes.name: The End Game (2)
episodes.overview: Desperate to clear Janina's name, Sorjonen races to piece together fragments from different crime scenes and catch the suspected killer off guard

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Detective Inspector Kari Sorjonen is one of the most respected officers at the National Bureau of Investigation in Finland. When his wife barely survives brain cancer, Sorjonen decides to take his family to an idyllic small town near the border of Russia, to live a quiet peaceful life.

episodes.name: Five Finger Exercise (1)
episodes.overview: Double homicide takes Kari Sorjonen to the other side of the border, where he finds that past isn't where he once left it.

episodes.name: Five Finger Exercise (2)
episodes.overview: Sorjonen needs to learn more about Lena's past in order to catch a murderer who has nothing to lose.

episodes.name: The Rite of Spring (1)
episodes.overview: A fetus preserved in formaline is found in head of day care center Susanna Lehto's home. Kari's investigations reveal hidden past regarding children.

episodes.name: The Rite of Spring (2)
episodes.overview: After learning about Susanna Lehto's past, Sorjonen is the only one who doesn't think the case is solved.

episodes.name: Cat’s Cradle (1)
episodes.overview: Sorjonen takes a leave of absence because of his wife. Young man is shot on broad daylight. Niko Uusitalo is chosen to lead the investigations.

episodes.name: Cat’s Cradle (2)
episodes.overview: Rooftop killer's case comes near Sorjonen's family. Despite of his dire family situation, Kari promises to catch the killer fast.

episodes.name: Bloodmaid (1)
episodes.overview: Old missing person case is re-opened after dead body is found in student housing. Sorjonen must solve one of the most complicated crime scene in VARE's history.

episodes.name: Bloodmaid (2)
episodes.overview: Two dead bodies and neither of them is the missing woman. Sorjonen finds something that he's too afraid to tell to his colleagues.

episodes.name: Without a Shadow (1)
episodes.overview: Sons of lawyer Laakkonen, Valdek and Nikolai, come to Sorjonen to find their missing mother and step daughter. Old case is re-opened after trace leads back to Russia.

episodes.name: Without a Shadow (2)
episodes.overview: Both families, Sorjonen and Jaakkola, have to admit that the past isn't where they left it.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: In season 2, no one will be able to escape their past. The five crimes of the season are called Five Finger Exercise, The Rite of Spring, Cat’s Cradle, Bloodmaid and Without a Shadow. Each of these murder cases takes the viewer on a journey into humanity’s dark secrets in the midst of a small town’s summer idyll on the shores of Lake Saimaa.

episodes.name: The Human Stain
episodes.overview: As Kari and family wrestle with devastating news, Heikkinen calls to ask for help with a kidnapping case, and Katia stands trial for attempted murder.

episodes.name: The Human Beast (1)
episodes.overview: Over Niko's objections, Kari dives into a series of grisly crimes that yield more echoes of past cases. Janina grows frustrated with her father.

episodes.name: The Human Beast (2)
episodes.overview: As the team races to track down potential victims, Kari scours the country for news of the killer's daughter. A disturbing video captures a new crime.

episodes.name: Sons and Lovers (1)
episodes.overview: When a man is murdered inside his room at a retirement home, Kari and team question his three very different sons and his much younger girlfriend.

episodes.name: Sons and Lovers (2)
episodes.overview: The week's events play out from a different angle, revealing new dynamics within the family. Meanwhile, Kari grapples with his own father issues.

episodes.name: Sons and Lovers (3)
episodes.overview: After another key figure in the case is found dead, Kari revisits a suspicious tragedy in the family's past. Janina interrogates Jarkko on camera.

episodes.name: The Lady in the Looking-Glass (1)
episodes.overview: The ritualistic murder of a young swimming instructor draws the team to a conservative religious community teeming with secrets.

episodes.name: The Lady in the Looking-Glass (2)
episodes.overview: Shocking news and an unsettling encounter stoke tensions in the community. Kari leaps into action after finding Janina's diary.

episodes.name: Chess Story (1)
episodes.overview: A mysterious outbreak leaves Kari locked down in a hospital ward — just as he and the team brace for the return of Lasse Maasalo.

episodes.name: Chess Story (2)
episodes.overview: With the city in crisis, Anneli faces an ultimatum, and Kari must decide just how far he's willing to go to stop his nemesis.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: While juggling concerns about his family's future and a spate of new crimes, Kari squares off against an adversary who's been studying his past cases.
